##Getting Vector Data 

get_nhd

```{r}
nhd = findNHD(clip_unit = list("UCSB", 10, 10))
str(nhd, max = 1)
```

```{r}
explore(nhd)
```


get_huc

```{r}
huc10 = findHUC(clip_unit = list("UCSB", 10, 10))
str(nhd, max = 1)
```

```{r}
explore(huc10)
```

get_waterbodies

```{r}
wb = findWaterbodies(clip_unit = list("UCSB", 20, 20))
str(wb, max = 1)
```

```{r}
explore(wb)
```

get_roads

```{r}
tiger = findRoads(clip_unit = list("UCSB", 10, 10))
str(tiger, max = 1)
```

```{r}
explore(tiger)
```
